attributes.action: Piers Morgan to be knighted for his service during the Covid-19 pandemic.
attributes.background: The Government should recognise Piers Morgan for his outstanding service to the nation as a broadcaster.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour.

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here: https://www.gov.uk/honours
